aspell.command:
cd $SOURCE_DIR
TARBALL=$(ls aspell*.tar.bz2)
DIRECTORY=$(tar tf $TARBALL | cut -d/ -f1 | uniq)

tar xf $TARBALL
cd $DIRECTORY

sassc.command:
cd $SOURCE_DIR
TARBALL=$(ls libsass*.tar*)
DIRECTORY=$(tar tf $TARBALL | cut -d/ -f1 | uniq)

tar xf $TARBALL
cd $DIRECTORY

gnome-shell-extensions.command: mkdir build && cd build && meson -Dextension_set=all --prefix=/usr .. && ninja
